requestId.description: requestId: the identifier of the request to which this is a response. The DOIP service must include in its response the requestId provided by the client.

status.description: status: an identifier that indicates the status of the request. Status codes shall have associated unique identifiers resolvable as specified in the IRP.

record.description: record: the JSON object containing all type-value-pairs that were used to override the previous values in the PID record.

attributes.description: attributes: JSON object that returns the type-value pairs in the PID record.

description: Response of a O.DOIP/Op.Extended-Update request, including a serialized DO and the updated values in the PID record.
